# iosxr_tcp (Resource)

This resource can manage the TCP configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_tcp" "example" {
  window_size                  = 32768
  synwait_time                 = 15
  path_mtu_discovery           = true
  path_mtu_discovery_age_timer = "20"
  receive_queue                = 200
  timestamp                    = true
  throttle                     = 40
  throttle_high_water_mark     = 70
  selective_ack                = true
  mss                          = 1460
  accept_rate                  = 500
  ao                           = true
  ao_keychains = [
    {
      keychain_name = "TCP_KEYCHAIN"
      keys = [
        {
          key_name   = "200"
          send_id    = 10
          receive_id = 20
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `accept_rate` (Number) Set the maximum TCP connection accept rate
  - Range: `1`-`1000`
- `ao` (Boolean) Enter into TCP authentication option configuration mode
- `ao_keychains` (Attributes List) TCP AO keychain mode (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ao_keychains))
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `mss` (Number) Set the TCP initial maximum segment size
  - Range: `68`-`10000`
- `path_mtu_discovery` (Boolean) Enable Path MTU Discovery on new TCP connections
- `path_mtu_discovery_age_timer` (String) Set Path MTU aging timer
- `receive_queue` (Number) TCP receive packet queue size
  - Range: `40`-`800`
- `selective_ack` (Boolean) Enable TCP selective-ACK
- `synwait_time` (Number) Set time to wait on new TCP connections
  - Range: `5`-`30`
- `throttle` (Number) Throttle receive buffer (in percentage)
  - Range: `0`-`100`
- `throttle_high_water_mark` (Number) High water mark throttling (default 70 percent)
  - Range: `0`-`100`
- `timestamp` (Boolean) Enable TCP timestamp option
- `window_size` (Number) TCP receive window size
  - Range: `2048`-`65535`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--ao_keychains"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ao_keychains`

Required:

- `keychain_name` (String) TCP AO keychain mode

Optional:

- `keys` (Attributes List) Configure TCP-AO IDs for a Key (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ao_keychains--keys))

<a id="nestedatt--ao_keychains--keys"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ao_keychains.keys`

Required:

- `key_name` (String) Configure TCP-AO IDs for a Key

Optional:

- `receive_id` (Number) Configure ReceiveID to be used for this key
  - Range: `0`-`255`
- `send_id` (Number) Configure SendID to be used for this key
  - Range: `0`-`255`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_tcp.example ""
```
